Container.Name: testerfy
Container.Overview:
Testerfy — Spotify Playlist Curation Made Easy
Burn through discovery playlists at lightning speed. Swipe right to like (saves to your target playlists and skips), swipe left to dislike (removes from source and skips). Every decision is logged with timestamps, decision speed, and listening stats — so you can track your taste over time.
FEATURES: - One-tap Like/Dislike with auto-skip to the next track - Playlist Guard — prevents accidental changes when playing outside approved playlists - Passive listening tracker — logs songs you hear without rating - Decision time analytics — see how fast you judge tracks - Full action history with undo support - Mobile-friendly swipe interface - Encrypted tokens at rest (AES-256-GCM) - Pairs with Mellodex (github.com/ozmoetr/mellodex) for deep listening analytics
REQUIREMENTS: - Tailscale plugin (REQUIRED — provides HTTPS for Spotify OAuth) - Spotify Premium (for playback control) - Spotify Developer App (free — takes 2 minutes)
================================================ SETUP GUIDE (5 minutes) ================================================
STEP 1: INSTALL TAILSCALE Spotify requires HTTPS for authentication. Tailscale provides this for free. - Unraid → Apps → Search "Tailscale" → Install - Settings → Tailscale → Authenticate with your Tailscale account
STEP 2: FIND YOUR TAILSCALE URL Open Unraid terminal and run: tailscale status Note your machine name (e.g. "tower" or "unraid"). Your URL will be: https://MACHINE.TAILNET.ts.net:5247 Find your tailnet name at: https://login.tailscale.com/admin/machines
STEP 3: ENABLE TAILSCALE SERVE Run in Unraid terminal (before clicking Apply): tailscale serve --bg --https 5247 http://localhost:5247 Wait 2-5 minutes, verify with: tailscale serve status
STEP 4: CREATE SPOTIFY DEVELOPER APP - Go to developer.spotify.com/dashboard - Create App → Name it "Testerfy" - Add Redirect URI: https://MACHINE.TAILNET.ts.net:5247/api/auth/callback - Copy your Client ID and Client Secret
STEP 5: GENERATE A SESSION SECRET Run in terminal: openssl rand -hex 32 Copy the output — paste it in the Session Secret field below.
STEP 6: FILL IN THE FIELDS BELOW AND CLICK APPLY
Full guide: https://github.com/ozmoetr/testerfy#setup

Config.Description: Database and config storage. Back this up to preserve your history.

Config.Name: Spotify Client ID
Config.Description: From developer.spotify.com → Dashboard → Your App → Settings

Config.Name: Spotify Client Secret
Config.Description: From developer.spotify.com → Dashboard → Your App → Settings → View client secret

Config.Name: Spotify Redirect URI
Config.Description: https://YOUR-MACHINE.YOUR-TAILNET.ts.net:5247/api/auth/callback — must match your Spotify Developer Dashboard exactly

Config.Name: Session Secret
Config.Description: Random security key. Generate with: openssl rand -hex 32
